item.title: HOA Dues
item.description: The Windsboro HOA dues are $400 per year. Dues for 2022 are due on March 31, 2022. You must pay by a mailed check to the following address: Windsboro HOA Treasurer 200 SE Windsboro Drive Lee's Summit, MO 64063 When making your payment, ensure your lot number is visible, preferably written in the checkâ€™s memo field. The HOA does not offer refunds and all transactions are final. Your cancelled check serves as your receipt of payment.

item.title: The Ponds
item.description: Still gotta do this The Ponds The 5 ponds in Windsboro add much beauty and wildlife to our community. The Pond Committee will continue to evaluate all available measures to maintain the appearance and quality of the ponds including maintenance of dam structures, outlet structures, embankments and sediment forebay cleaning. Several of the ponds have a variety of fish species ( catch and release only), turtles and other wildlife for the enjoyment of all Windsboro residents.

item.title: The Pool
item.description: Thank you to all neighborhood volunteers who make our pool a great place to spend your summer here at Windsboro. Hours Memorial Day Weekend through Labor Day Weekend 10am - 10pm Rules Children age 12 and under must be accompanied by an adult (age 18 or older) in the pool area. No Lifeguard on duty. Swim at your own risk. No diving is allowed. Animals are not allowed in or around the Swimming Poolm except that service animals as defined by the Americans with Disabilities Act mus be allowed on pool decks and any other places the public is allowed.
